title: M Cream

description: The relationship between a journalist and a lawyer she meets while investigating a story grows complicated as she uncovers layers of deception.

actors: Fabrice Luchini, Juliette Binoche, Valeria Bruni Tedeschi, Jean-Luc Vincent

actors: Dhanush, Kajal Aggarwal, Robo Shankar, Vijay Yesudas

description: Devin Overstreet may be the class valedictorian, but he hasn't had much life experience. Enter Mac Johnson, a 10th-year senior and weed dealer.
